alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Custer, north central Oglala Lakota and south central Pennington Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of Scenic, or 34 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scenic and Sheep Mountain Table. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains
